entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Churchill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -21.5°C
Wind: NE 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
